title: Unable to Connect to Server
body: I've been on the boards multiple times and have tried multiple things to stop the disconnecting issue. I have now been placed in lower que and have to wait 20 mins before playing and it still disconnects. I even downloaded the Hextech Repair tool but have no idea what I need to do to fix it. Please help and maybe take off my 20 minute wait since this isn't my fault.

replies.body: Getting dc'd over and over like that can be a sign that your network just can't get a clean signal with our servers. Update your Port Forwarding and DNS settings following the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as some first steps, and ***test it in a custom game or practice game first***.
